about.title: About me
about.desc: I am a Computer Engineer graduated from the Polytechnic University of Valencia in Spain, with more than 4 years of experience in the field. I love learning new things and acquiring new skills every day. In my free time, I enjoy reading and going to the mountain.
about.bookDesc: The Truth About the Harry Quebert Affair

learning.title: Now Learning...
learning.desc: Currently I am focused on the following subjects:

item1.title: Sell Cars
item1.desc: Marketplace to buy/sell cars , using Typescript, React, NextJS and Supabase.

item2.title: TFG
item2.desc: Final project for the Computer Science Degree. This web allow you to order food from a restaurant.

item4.title: Web Miguel Pinto
item4.desc: Web for the painter Miguel Pinto. Using NextJS and deployed in Vercel.
